title: For Europe, Russia Sanctions Will Sting
sub_head: EU sanctions will hurt some sectors, but the bloc didn’t sanction gas and oil, which would hit both Russia and Europe’s economies hardest
body:
Russia’s invasion of Ukraine threatens to set back Europe’s economic recovery from the Covid-19 pandemic, as sanctions, tensions and energy prices weigh on businesses and households in parts of the continent at a time when growth is slowing and inflation rising.
The scale of the shock will depend on how far tit-for-tat sanctions escalate the economic side of the conflict.
